title: Echofon PRO for Twitter v2.0.0.6 from anurag
description:
Echofon PRO for Android - A super clean Twitter app
Echofon is the easy-to-use, super fast Twitter app that smartly syncs across all your devices.
Wrapped in a beautiful, clean interface, Echofon for Android packs a punch, featuring gorgeous desktop widget, instant notifications, light and dark color themes and more Ã¢â‚¬â€œ all the Twitter features you need to bring order to your busy social media life.
Key Features:
* Full-featured dashboard widgets
* Sync between all your Echofon apps on Android or iOS devices so you never read a Tweet, @Mention or Direct Message twice 
* Background notifications alert you of new Direct Messages and @Mentions
* Easily manage multiple Twitter accounts
* Choose from light or battery-saving dark color themes
* View threaded conversations all in one place to easily keep track of who said what
* Full set of Twitter functionality: Tweet, Retweet, Direct Message, @Mention, lists
* Offers photo previews right in your Twitter timeline
